title: Seek Protection from the Shadow Curse

protected from even the deepest parts of shadow curse. We travelled through the shadow-cursed lands without finding our own Moonlantern. We found a Moonlantern. How to unlock Seek Protection from the Shadow Curse

Seek Protection from the Shadow Curse is a subquest for the primary Main Quest: Infiltrate Moonrise Towers
